# Упражнения 1.6

## 1.6.1.

Какие функции обратны функциям:

1. $$y=2x+4$$
2. $$y=x^2-2$$
3. $$y=x^3+3x^2+3x$$
4. $$y=x^4+2x^2$$

### Решение

#### 1. $y = 2x + 4$

$$
\begin{flalign}
                            y &= 2x + 4\\
          y \color{blue}{- 4} &= 2x + 4 \color{blue}{- 4}\\
                        y - 4 &= 2x\\
\frac{y - 4}{\color{blue}{2}} &= \frac{2x}{\color{blue}{2}}\\
              \frac{y - 4}{2} &= x\\
\\
f(x) = \frac{x - 4}{2}\\
\end{flalign}
$$

#### 2. $y = x^2 - 2$

$$
\begin{flalign}
                y  &= x^2 - 2\\
y \color{blue}{+ 2} &= x^2 - 2 \color{blue}{+ 2}\\
                y + 2 &= x^2\\
                \sqrt{y + 2} &= \sqrt{x^2}\\
                \sqrt{y + 2} &= x\\
\\
f(x) = \sqrt{x + 2}\\
\end{flalign}
$$

#### 3. $y = x^3 + 3x^2 + 3x$

$$
\begin{flalign}
                      y &= x^3 + 3x^2 + 3x\\
    y \color{blue}{+ 1} &= x^3 + 3x^2 + 3x \color{blue}{+ 1}\\
                  y + 1 &= (x + 1)^3\\
         \sqrt[3]{y + 1} &= \sqrt[3]{(x + 1)^3}\\
         \sqrt[3]{y + 1} &= x + 1\\
\sqrt[3]{y + 1} \color{blue}{- 1}&= x + 1 \color{blue}{- 1}\\
    \sqrt[3]{y + 1} - 1 &= x\\
\\
f(x) = \sqrt[3]{x + 1} - 1\\
\end{flalign}
$$

#### 4. $y = x^4 + 2x^2$

$$
\begin{flalign}
                      y &= x^4 + 2x^2\\
     y \color{blue}{+ 1}&= x^4 + 2x^2 \color{blue}{+ 1}\\
                  y + 1 &= (x^2 + 1)^2\\
           \sqrt{y + 1} &= \sqrt{(x^2 + 1)^2}\\
\sqrt{y + 1} \color{blue}{- 1} &= x^2 + 1 \color{blue}{- 1}\\
       \sqrt{y + 1} - 1 &= x^2\\
       \sqrt{\sqrt{y + 1} - 1} &= \sqrt{x^2}\\
              \sqrt{\sqrt{y + 1} - 1} &= x\\
\\
f(x) = \sqrt{\sqrt{x + 1} - 1}\\
\end{flalign}
$$
